aka: My Mom is an Alien2 - The Monster
this_title: 我阿媽係外星人2 之怪獸現身
trans_title: My Mom is an Alien2 - The Monster
introduction: 阿毛從小就有一個疑問：為何媽媽總是這麼萬能？媽媽生完小貝比之後，力量變得更強大，整天不用睡、不用吃…，阿毛反覆的想著，難道媽媽是「外星人」？Ever wondered how awesome your mom used to be? Mo has been asking this question since the toddling days: how come mom was like almighty? Is she an “ET”?
chinese_title: 我阿媽係外星人2 之怪獸現身
